reviews.review_msg: Not clear, quiet and talks about random and useless info. It would be funny in how bad it was if the class hadn't been worth marks. Difficult to follow for these reasons in an otherwise simple class. She was also late to class a lot.

I can also attest that she is very disorganized and is not a good presenter. She seems nervous about speaking. Although the subject was interesting, her presentation style made it very dull. She goes on long random tangents that are dull and take away from the class. Would recommend other teachers as there are much better ones at sfu.
I absolutely love her teaching style. I will be taking future classes with her.
